Name: Isolator
Key_Features: Real Contact Position Indication , Large Terminals With Safety Shutter , Circuit Label Holder , Padlocking Provision Available , Dual Contacts Breaking Mechanism , Finger Proof Terminals IP20 , Bi-Connect Terminals On Both Sides , Air Flow Channels , 7 Year Warranty , Bi-stable DIN-Clip helps for installation , Line Load Reversibility , IS/IEC Certified
Full_Description: Polycab Isolator offers a visible and reliable way to physically separate a portion of the electrical system from the power supply, preventing the flow of electricity and reducing the risk of electrical accidents
Short_Description: Provides isolation between load and supply
